main event: A civilian Air Force Police reported a peculiar aerial observation in Sacramento, California on 15th July 1949. The object appeared as a mirror reflecting light, traveled faster than a jet, and was in sight for only a few seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared as a mirror reflecting light and wobbled as it traveled, making it difficult to determine its shape.
It was estimated to be at twice the altitude of two jet-propelled aircraft flying in the opposite direction.
The object's speed was observed to be greatly in excess of any jet aircraft previously witnessed.
The civilian Air Force Police who reported the observation are noted as not given to exaggeration, lending credibility to the report.
The observation lasted only for a few seconds, indicating the swiftness of the object's appearance and disappearance.
witnesses: Civilian Air Force Police, McClellan AFB
